text:
e="preserve">Charles Gordon (May 13, 1947 – October 31, 2020) was an American movie producer. His brother was movie producer Lawrence Gordon. He was born in Belzoni, Mississippi. He was best known for producing "Field of Dreams", "Die Hard" and "The Rocketeer".
Gordon died of cancer in Los Angeles on October 31, 2020 at the age of 73.
